mapper.select: select sm.parent_id parentMenuId, sm.id menuId, sm.name menuName, sm.perms permission, sm.sort sort, sm.url href, sm.icon icon, sm.is_show isShow, sm.type menuType, sm.useable useable, sm.create_by createBy, sm.create_time createDate, sm.last_update_by updateBy, sm.last_update_time updateDate, sm.remarks remarks, sm.del_flag delFlag from sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON srm.role_id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON sur.user_id = su.id where 1=1 and sm.parent_id = 0 and sur.role_id = #{roleId} and su.name = #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu( name, parent_id, usr, perms, is_show, sort, type, icon, order_num, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, remarks, del_flag )values ( #{name}, #{parent_id}, #{usr}, #{perms}, #{is_show}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{order_num}, #{create_by}, now(), #{last_update_by}, now(), #{remarks}, #{del_flag} )
